headers.Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self' https://*.yandex.ru https://*.yandex.net; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://*.yandex.ru https://*.yandex.net; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://*.yandex.ru; img-src 'self' data: https://*.yandex.ru https://*.yandex.net; connect-src 'self' https://*.yandex.ru https://*.yandex.net;
